price: 238. Bobatela basambela, mpe sambela ya sima ya nzanga. Mpe botelema na limemia liboso ya Allah.
arabic: حَٰفِظُواْ عَلَى ٱلصَّلَوَٰتِ وَٱلصَّلَوٰةِ ٱلۡوُسۡطَىٰ وَقُومُواْ لِلَّهِ قَٰنِتِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: ḥāfiẓū ʿalā al-ṣalawāti wal-ṣalati al-wus'ṭā waqūmū lillahi qānitīna
